comments:
Hi,

I am unable to use the php new project feature, it throws the stack trace listed below, let me know if you require any more details.

OS: FC3. 
Java: j2sdk1.4.2_08 (sun)
Eclipse: eclipse-SDK-3.1.2-linux-gtk.tar.gz
WTP: from update site(http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/updates/)
PHP: from update site(http://www.zend.com/phpide/)
startup cmd: ./eclipse -jvmargs -Xms1024M -Xmx1024

No problems during installation.

File->New->PHP project throws the following error:

From the link you sent the PHP plug-in requires Eclipse 3.2RC6 at the very minimum to operate.  Try installing all of the required components from the links provided by the Zend site.
